Package com.google.gwt.user.client.ui

Class FocusListenerAdapter

java.lang.Object
com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.FocusListenerAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
FocusListener, EventListener
@Deprecated public abstract class FocusListenerAdapter extends Object implements FocusListener
Deprecated.
Use FocusHandler and BlurHandler instead
An adapter to simplify focus event listeners that do not need all events defined on the FocusListener interface.
